title: Administer UD/UCMDB deployment
content:
This section includes the following topics for administering containerized UD/UCMDB deployment:

  • Enable TLS connections to external PostgreSQL
  • Scale up UD/UCMDB deployment size
  • Restart UD/UCMDB
  • Change UD/UCMDB FQDN
  • Change UD/UCMDB nginx certificate
  • Renew UD/UCMDB certificates
  • Reconfigure UD/UCMDB database
  • Change UD/UCMDB database user password
  • Rolling restart a UD/UCMDB service
  • Access UD/UCMDB log files
